message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is a special opportunity tailored to your needs, considering the value you see in it. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to stay within my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose a price of $11,000. This allows us to meet somewhere in the middle while still ensuring a fair return for our product. I hope this proposal works for you.
